MenuScreen - Class in main.java.org.skloch.game
A screen to display the game menu to the player has the buttons "Start", "Settings", "Leaderboard", "Credits, "Exit" Also displays a tutorial window and an avatar select screen
MenuScreen(HustleGame) - Constructor for class main.java.org.skloch.game.MenuScreen
A class to display a menu screen, initially gives the player 4 options, Start, Settings, Credits, Quit Upon hitting start, a tutorial window is shown, and then an avatar select screen is shown, and then it is switched to GameScreen.
move(float) - Method in class main.java.org.skloch.game.Player
Handles all the logic involved in moving the player given keyboard inputs If the player encounters an object, they will not be allowed to move into the space, but will attempt to 'slide' off of it.
moving - Variable in class main.java.org.skloch.game.Player
